model

Class GoL

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.GoL

  • public class GoL
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with data related to game state and execution. Contains logic for implementing the rule set onto a cell.

    • Method Detail

      • rules

        public static byte rules(int neighbors,
                         int aliveStatus)
        Method that determines if a cell is to live or not in the next generation of the game based on the conditions set for for birth and survival in the class' fields bornAmount and surviveAmount.
        Parameters:
        neighbors - the amount of live cells neighboring the specified cell.
        aliveStatus - the current status of the specified cell.
        Returns:
        the cell's status for the next generation.
